item.title: General discussion on SIGHASH_NOINPUT, OP_CHECKSIGFROMSTACK, and OP_SECURETHEBAG
item.description: SIGHASH_NOINPUT, ANYPREVOUT, OP_CHECKSIGFROMSTACK, OP_CHECKOUTPUTSHASHVERIFY, and OP_SECURETHEBAG https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1136636856093876225 There’s apparently some political messaging around OP_SECURETHEBAG and “secure the bag” might be an Andrew Yang thing. SIGHASH_NOINPUT A bunch of us are familiar with NOINPUT. Does anyone need an explainer? What’s the difference from the original NOINPUT and the new one? NOINPUT is kind of scary to at least some people. If we just do NOINPUT, does that start causing problems in bitcoin?
